content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_basalt
inventory=[{"type": "spawner", "quantity": 11, "index": 10}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "white_stained_glass", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 49, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 63, "index": 32}, {"type": "warped_nylium", "quantity": 9, "index": 33}, {"type": "oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "cookie", "quantity": 30, "index": 38}]
thought: I need to craft 4 polished basalt. To do this, I need to place 4 basalt blocks in a 2x2 grid in the crafting table. I will first move 1 basalt from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_basalt
inventory=[{"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 11, "index": 10}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "white_stained_glass", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 49, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 63, "index": 32}, {"type": "warped_nylium", "quantity": 9, "index": 33}, {"type": "oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "cookie", "quantity": 30, "index": 38}]
thought: I have moved 1 basalt block to slot 1. I now need to move another basalt block to slot 2 (to the right of slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_basalt
inventory=[{"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 11, "index": 10}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "white_stained_glass", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 49, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 63, "index": 32}, {"type": "warped_nylium", "quantity": 9, "index": 33}, {"type": "oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "cookie", "quantity": 30, "index": 38}]
thought: I have moved 2 basalt blocks to the crafting table. I now need to move another basalt block to slot 4 (below slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_basalt
inventory=[{"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 11, "index": 10}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "white_stained_glass", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 49, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 63, "index": 32}, {"type": "warped_nylium", "quantity": 9, "index": 33}, {"type": "oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "cookie", "quantity": 30, "index": 38}]
thought: I have moved 3 basalt blocks to the crafting table. I now need to move the last basalt block to slot 5 (to the right of slot 4).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_basalt
inventory=[{"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 11, "index": 10}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "white_stained_glass", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 49, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 63, "index": 32}, {"type": "warped_nylium", "quantity": 9, "index": 33}, {"type": "oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "cookie", "quantity": 30, "index": 38}]
thought: I have moved all 4 basalt blocks to the crafting table. Now I can craft the polished basalt and move it to slot 11 (where the basalt blocks were previously stored).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
